title: Ripple: Spreading Love for Performances
overview: Ripple is a social-driven performance app designed to bring audiences closer, therefore enriches the experience before and after a performance, creating an environment where sharred experiences ripple outward across personal networks.

title: Her Voice Behind the Poems
overview:
Centered on the recurring image of the Divine Woman in Chinese mythology, the project reflects on how her figure, started from stories of women drowned in water, gradually dissolves into myth, leaving the original voices unheard.

The lettering, shaped by the voice reading the poems, and the water-inspired imagery echo the Divine Woman’s shifting presence. By contrasting literal and free translations, the project seeks to visualize the hidden voices behind the poems.

title: Science Snacks: Resonate with Friends
overview:
In physics, resonance phenomena occurs with all types of vibrations and waves. And most importantly, it demonstrates interaction between at least two systems.

This book seperates each experiment into two parts: hands-up and eyes-on. With the special binding technique, readers are encouraged to read with their friends together and discuss about the resonance between real life and theories.

title: Gray Muzzle Society: Non-profit Organization Rebranding
genre: Branding, UI, UX, Creative Coding, Typeface Design
software: Figma, Adobe Illustrator, Visual Studio Code
overview: The Gray Muzzle Society is a non-profit dedicated to giving senior, special needs, and "misfit" animals a second chance. Through foster networks, farm sanctuaries, and reptile rescue programs, they fulfill a touching mission: ensuring every animal grows old in a loving home. The visual identity centers on the texture and flow of animal fur, used as a metaphor for the organization’s impact.

title: Inkai Typeface Design
overview: INKAI marries Chinese traditional calligraphy especially Kaishu (regular script) with Latin typography. It has sharp edges and powerful vision, creating a harmonious balance between traditional Chinese calligraphy and modern typographic principles. Designed for optimal readability, INKAI delivers both cultural richness and practical functionality.

title: Inkai Specimen
overview:
INKAI blends Chinese traditional calligraphy into Latin typeface design. With its sharp edges and powerful vision, INKAI creates a harmonious balance between traditional Chinese calligraphy and modern typographic principles.

This type specimen introduces INKAI from its concepts, sketches, features, glyphs sets. And give several typographic samples to showcase the bilingual usage, pratical functionality, and cultural richness of this tyepeface.

title: SIXIÈME SENS
software: Cinema 4D, Octane Render, Touch Designer, After Effects

title: Drowsy Typeface
overview: Drowsy is a medium-weight display sans-serif typeface with high contrast. Its elegant curves, even portion, and unique terminal treatments evoke a peaceful, poetic feeling, and effortless chic. With 3 styles: dripping, floating, and stretching, it adapts to various moods from boutique glamour to joyful dance.

title: Drowsy Specimen
overview:
The specimen captures the peacefulness, poetic feeling, and effortless chic of "Drowsy" the typeface evoked from its elegant curves, even portion, and special treatments on terminals.

For each style set, I selected a poem that share the similar feeling as the style set. With its vintage color palette and butterfly binding, the specimen guides readers to the glamour, joyful, and gentle world of "Drowsy".

title: Rain And Tears: Thesis Book
overview: The thesis book documents my concepts, essay, design, and production process for my theie project, Rain And Tears, in a dynamic, fluid, and multi-layered type system that resonate with its visual.
